Mass. man first to die in state of West Nile since '05

State officials also announced three other human cases of the virus and raised the risk level for mosquito-borne illnesses to at least moderate throughout Mass. (Globe)

Somerville priest arrested on charges of repeated indecent assault of a child

Bruins, rest of NHL on brink of lockout

If there is no new deal between NHL players and owners after Sept. 15, the league will initiate a lockout, putting the start of the Bruins' season in doubt. (Boston Globe)
